author: kaz
msg: Added a new property to the list of Maven default.properties that
specifies the URL to use when the 'update-jars' target is invoked.
Previously, this was hardcoded to Jakarta.  By adding the property, this
will enable users to override in their local project.properties.  This
change was prompted because Henri is planning on submitting a patch to
UpdateResources that will enable this parameter to accept multiple URLs
that should be used.  This will enable a user to use the Jarkarta repo
as well as a private/corporate repo.
Also updated the documentation to reflect the new property.  I plan on
splitting off the documentation of Maven properties into its own xdoc in
the very near future as the list is growing.  For example, with the
checkstyle changes that I'll incorporate (from patches submitted by
Warner), I need to document several default properties.

author: dion
msg: Made sure author and msg were htmlescape'd, as
the generating task was using CDATA just in case.
